external_games.name: Hidden Expedition: The Price of Paradise
Hidden Expedition: The Price of Paradise

name: Hidden Expedition: The Price of Paradise
storyline: It’s your first field expedition as an expert in ancient Aztec languages, and you’re aiming to make a good impression, but the job takes an unexpected turn when someone awakens Coatlicue, the Aztec goddess of nature! Now it’s up to you to track down and stop the human that’s Coatlicue tasked with her mission to reclaim the planet and punish humanity. You’ll need all your wits and puzzle-solving skills to outwit this deadly threat and return Coatlicue to her eternal rest. Are you bold enough to face her challenge? Find out in this exciting new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!
summary:
Domini Games proudly presents the next adventurous entry in the electrifying Hidden Expedition series.

It’s your first field expedition as an expert in ancient Aztec languages, and you’re aiming to make a good impression, but the job takes an unexpected turn when someone awakens Coatlicue, the Aztec goddess of nature! Now it’s up to you to track down and stop the human that’s Coatlicue tasked with her mission to reclaim the planet and punish humanity. You’ll need all your wits and puzzle-solving skills to outwit this deadly threat and return Coatlicue to her eternal rest. Are you bold enough to face her challenge? Find out in this exciting new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!
